text: Beverley Marian McLachlin (born September 7, 1943) is a Canadian jurist and author. She was the 17th chief justice of Canada from 2000 to 2017. She was the first woman to hold that position and the longest-serving chief justice in Canadian history. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of Canada Category:Politicians from Alberta
title: Beverley McLachlin
